name: Warden of the isles (itch)
description:
Become the warden of the Isles. Leap from one island to the other to ensure the pink eggs are not eating all the grass again ! If you find some, push them over the bounds of the island.

Controls:

  • Walk : WASD / ZQSD
  • Fly : MOUSE MOTION
  • Punch: LEFT CLIC
  • Big punch: RIGHT CLIC
  • Fly/land : SPACE BAR
  • Toggle fullscreen:  ESCAPE

Team :

  • Hernz  (twitter)
  • PatteDeCanaard (twitter)

Engine/Tools:

  • Godot 3.1
  • Krita
  • Gimp
  • Blender
  • LMMS

All the code, sounds and graphical assets have been created during the jam.
